metadata.synopsis: Systemic discussions about partnering, breakups etc.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Triggerd from Laezel_InParty2 and Laezel_InPaty2_Nested_DefaultQuestionBank only

2.speaker: Lae'zel
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Player did act 1 romance scene with Gale, but not act 2 yet. Player did act 2 romanec scene with another character.

11.speaker: Lae'zel
11.context: InternalNodeContext: Player did act 1 romance scene with Gale, but not act 2 yet. Player did act 2 romanec scene with another character.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: It's true. I want to be with Wyll.

48.speaker: Lae'zel
48.text: I would've thought you'd choose a partner with more sting.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: You just wanted sex. I want more than that.

36.speaker: Lae'zel
36.context: InternalNodeContext: DID ACT 2 romance with Gale, and dumped another character in their inparty

38.speaker: Lae'zel
38.text: I am not yours. You are not mine. Or so I've come to believe.
38.context: InternalNodeContext: DID ACT 2 romance with Lae'zel then dumped her in another characters' inpartyNodeContext: Breakup path. Player romanced someone else and Lae'zel ends their relationship.

79.speaker: Lae'zel
79.text: Let's hope Astarion doesn't tear off too much of your flesh, hm?
79.context: InternalNodeContext: PLAYER has only done act 1 Astarion scene - that means they just slept with himNodeContext: Breakup path. Player romanced someone else and Lae'zel ends their relationship.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: It's you I want. I wasn't thinking clearly.

125.speaker: Lae'zel
125.text: Are you trying to make me feel better, or you?
125.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Player romanced someone else and Lae'zel ends their relationship.

23.speaker: Lae'zel
23.text: Either way, you look the fool.
23.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Player romanced someone else and Lae'zel ends their relationship.

18.speaker: Lae'zel
18.text: You were zhak vo'n'ash duj - source of my bruises. The wounds you inflicted will heal. But they will leave behind scars.
18.context:
NodeContext: JHAK Voh-nahsh DOO

Breakup path. Player romanced someone else and Lae'zel ends their relationship.

81.speaker: Player
81.text: I'm sorry. You're just too intense for me.

39.speaker: Lae'zel
39.text: What you really mean is that you're too mild for me. Why even live, if you don't live intensely?
39.context:
NodeContext: In response to: I'm sorry. You're just too intense for me.

Breakup path. Player romanced someone else and Lae'zel ends their relationship.

115.speaker: Player
115.text: Trust me, it's for the better.

113.speaker: Lae'zel
113.text: Yes, I'm sure you see it that way.

75.speaker: Lae'zel
75.text: You were zhak vo'n'ash duj - source of my bruises. The wounds you inflicted will heal. But they will leave behind scars.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: And you favour Wyll, no less. I would've thought you'd choose a partner with more sting.
1.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Player romanced someone else and Lae'zel ends their relationship.

41.speaker: Lae'zel
41.text: Karlach will make a fine lover, I'm sure. Let's hope she doesn't burn you to cinder before the day is out.
41.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Player romanced someone else and Lae'zel ends their relationship.

110.speaker: Lae'zel
110.text: Gale should be just to your tastes. Vanilla, to be precise.
110.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Player romanced someone else and Lae'zel ends their relationship.

93.speaker: Lae'zel
93.text: I can withstand most any wound. But one tainted by her shadow? It will take time to heal.
93.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Player romanced someone else and Lae'zel ends their relationship.

52.speaker: Lae'zel
52.text: And you favour Minthara, no less. I thought you valued yourself. Minthara certainly doesn't.
52.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Player romanced someone else and Lae'zel ends their relationship.

46.speaker: Lae'zel
46.text: You've made a choice. Or maybe you'll pretend Minthara made it for you.
46.context: InternalNodeContext: Pre-partnered with companion, partnered with Gale.

109.speaker: Lae'zel
109.text: Either way, I could hardly care less.

17.speaker: Lae'zel
17.text: You favour me above Gale. I suppose I should be flattered.

35.speaker: Lae'zel
35.text: You favour me above Wyll. I suppose I should be flattered.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: You favour me above Shadowheart. I suppose I should be flattered.

25.speaker: Lae'zel
25.text: And I am, to be truthful.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: I can't stop thinking about you. It's beyond explanation.

107.speaker: Lae'zel
107.text: I am Lae'zel of K'liir, born of Mother Gith. An enviable specimen even among my people.

74.speaker: Lae'zel
74.text: Of course you crave me. Just as I crave you.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: You're flattered? I thought you were above that kind of sentiment.

68.speaker: Lae'zel
68.text: Why should I not want to be wanted? This is not sentiment. It is a hunger to be satisfied.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: I have my doubts about you, but let's see where it goes.

66.speaker: Lae'zel
66.text: I'll enjoy winning it even more.

72.speaker: Lae'zel
72.context: InternalNodeContext: DID ACT 2 romance with Gale, and dumped another character in their inparty

76.speaker: Lae'zel
76.text: I've noted your growing obsession with me.
76.context: InternalNodeContext: DID ACT 2 romance with Gale, and dumped another character in their inparty

16.speaker: Lae'zel
16.text: You favour me above Astarion. I suppose I should be flattered.

122.speaker: Player
122.text: It's true. I want to be with Karlach.

70.speaker: Lae'zel
70.text: She'll make a fine lover, I'm sure. Let's hope she doesn't burn you to cinder before the day is out.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: You just wanted sex. I want more than that.

78.speaker: Lae'zel
78.context: InternalNodeContext: Player did act 1 romance scene with Gale, but not act 2 yet. Player did act 2 romanec scene with another character.

80.speaker: Lae'zel
80.text: I'd been thinking I'd take you again when the mood strikes. You were an even better lay than I expected.

10.speaker: Lae'zel
10.text: No matter - I've gone off the idea myself. We've an elder brain to destroy, and cannot risk unneeded distraction.

82.speaker: Lae'zel
82.context: InternalNodeContext: DID ACT 2 romance with Gale, and dumped another character in their inparty

45.speaker: Player
45.text: It's true. I want to be with Astarion.

55.speaker: Lae'zel
55.text: Is that so? Let's hope he doesn't tear off too much of your flesh, hm?

7.speaker: Lae'zel
7.text: Go, be satisfied. And try not to think of me when your special friend comes to keep you company.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: You just wanted sex. I want more than that.

87.speaker: Lae'zel
87.text: And so you chose Astarion in my place? I'm almost amused.

12.speaker: Lae'zel
12.text: But it heightens my cravings for you.

91.speaker: Lae'zel
91.text: Not that it matters. You've made your choice. I'd only debase myself by asking you to un-make it.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: I'll break it off with Gale. I'd rather see where things go with you.

28.speaker: Lae'zel
28.text: Of course you would. And if you pressed me, I might even say the same of you.
28.context: NodeContext: Still with some coldness, but slightly cheeky.

3.speaker: Lae'zel
3.context: NodeContext: Still with some coldness, but slightly cheeky.

103.speaker: Player

6.speaker: Player
6.text: I'll break it off with Astarion. I'd rather see where things go with you.

127.speaker: Player
127.text: You're right - I've made my choice.

104.context: NodeContext: Cheeky and slightly sarcastic but not too mean.
